title: Super high grade 1888 R & S Artistics set for sale
author: deken

posts.post_title: Super high grade 1888 R & S Artistics set for sale
posts.post_content:
I have a super high grade 1888 R & S Artistics for sale. I think
this is probably the highest graded set out there.

4 SGC 96’s
2 SGC 88’s
1 SGC 86
1 SGC 84
2 SGC 80’s

$11k obo. Would also consider trades, I collect mostly 50s and 60s baseball.

Thanks.
